headline: NC Cornhole LLC
summary: Tournament Director and event organizer. Supply equipment and organize your companies event. Also director for the American Cornhole Organization.

defaultPosition.description:
Triangle Cornhole was established in 2013  by Michael Byrd. In 2016 Truangle Cornhole became NC Cornhole LLC. The goal of NC Cornhole is to grow the sport of cornhole throughout the Raleigh, Durham, and Chapel Hill area of NC. NC Cornhole also specializes in running events for different venues around the Triangle area. 

NC cornhole sponsers an annual Toys for Tots event every December and just started a partnership with the Blondes vs Brunettes Alzheimers association to throw a large tournament in October.

NC Cornhole also holds monthly ACO regionals in Cary, NC.
Nccornhole.com
defaultPosition.title: CEO
